title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\HorizontalPodAutoscaling
name: HorizontalPodAutoscaling
description:
Configuration options for the horizontal pod autoscaling feature, which increases or decreases the number of replica pods a replication controller has based on the resource usage of the existing pods.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.HorizontalPodAutoscaling

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.disabled
params.description: Whether the Horizontal Pod Autoscaling feature is enabled in the cluster. When enabled, it ensures that a Heapster pod is running in the cluster, which is also used by the Cloud Monitoring service.

methods.name: getDisabled
methods.description:
